A webportal hosting the Fern Tree of Life (FTOL) and associated data

![](./images/header_ferns.png){.hero fig-alt="Photo of Crepidomanes minutum by Joel H. Nitta licensed under [CC-BY](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)"}

FTOL is a global phylogeny of extant fern species based on plastid DNA sequences.

For a complete description, see @Nitta2022.

FTOL is an on-going project and will be regularly updated as new sequence data become available.
